did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: Born in Sofia, Bulgaria. Practiced in Sofia and Vienna. Her firm's brochure, "Emerging Architecture," features three residential projects, a carpenter's shop, and a bank designed by Bulant & Wailzer.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Aneta Bulant-Kamenova Brochure, Aneta Bulant-Kamenova Brochure, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Aneta Bulant-Kamenova Brochure was donated in 2002.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The Aneta Bulant-Kamenova Brochure was added to the IAWA Small Collections Ms2009-054 in September 2009.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Aneta Bulant-Kamenova was born in Sofia, Bulgaria. Shortly after her graduation, she began teaching at the Technical University in Sofia. In 1985 she moved to Vienna to teach at the Technical University and she set up her practice in Vienna in 1988. In 1996 Bulant-Kamenova established Bulant & Wailzer with Klaus Wailzer. Some of their projects include Sailer House in Salzburg, Lightspace K. in Piesendorf, House P which is a conversion of the 'Haus auf der Hoh' in lower Austria and Raiffeisenkassa Piesendorf in Salzburg. See also the IAWA Biographical Database .

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Aneta Bulant-Kamenova collection consists of her firm, Bulant & Wailzer's brochure, Emerging Architecture. The brochure features three residential projects, a carpenter's shop, and a bank.
